meanings.definition: Fond of or adapted to luxury or indulgence in sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: She lived an epicurean lifestyle, enjoying the finest things in life.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's epicurean menu featured decadent dishes.
meanings.sent3: The epicurean cat only ate gourmet cat food.
meanings.sent4: His epicurean taste in fashion was evident in his designer wardrobe.
meanings.sent5: The epicurean feast was a symphony of flavors and aromas.

meanings.definition: Devoted to the pursuit of sensual pleasure, especially that derived from fine food and drink.
meanings.sent1: The epicurean couple savored every bite of their exquisite meal.
meanings.sent2: An epicurean delight, the dessert was a masterpiece of flavors.
meanings.sent3: The epicurean picnic in the park was a luxurious affair.
meanings.sent4: She had an epicurean approach to life, always seeking out the best experiences.
meanings.sent5: The epicurean connoisseur could distinguish the subtlest flavors in wine.

meanings.definition: A person who cultivates a refined taste, especially in food and wine.
meanings.sent1: The epicurean was known for hosting elegant dinner parties.
meanings.sent2: As an epicurean, he appreciated the artistry of a well-prepared dish.
meanings.sent3: The epicurean's collection of rare wines was the envy of all.
meanings.sent4: She was a true epicurean, always seeking out new culinary experiences.
meanings.sent5: The epicurean's palate was finely attuned to the nuances of flavor.
